tool_description: VAT number validation (value-added tax identification number) helps businesses avoid several potential issues and risks associated with inaccurate or invalid VAT numbers.
name: VAT number validator
title: VAT number validator

api_list.name: VAT number
api_list.description: Get info (name, address) about the given VAT number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vat-number-validator3.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/vat-number-validator/index.php/IE1234567T"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vat-number-validator3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vat-number-validator3.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/vat-number-validator/index.php/{vatnumber}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vat-number-validator3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
